channel.title: CVE Feed for SUPERAntiSpyware -- SUPERAntiSpyware Pro X
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SUPERAntiSpyware -- SUPERAntiSpyware Pro X

item.title: CVE-2024-0788|2024-08-01T18:18:18.646Z -- superantispyware -- superantispyware%20pro%20x
item.description: SUPERAntiSpyware Pro X v10.0.1260 is vulnerable to kernel-level API parameters manipulation and Denial of Service vulnerabilities by triggering the 0x9C402140 IOCTL code of the saskutil64.sys driver.
